mapper.insert: insert into member_table(m_id, m_password, m_name, m_email, m_phone) values(#{m_id},#{m_password},#{m_name},#{m_email},#{m_phone})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where m_id=#{m_id} and m_password=#{m_password}
mapper.update: update member_table set m_email=#{m_email}, m_phone=#{m_phone} where m_number=#{m_number};
mapper.select: select m_id from member_table where m_id=#{m_id};
